question: What did the first servant do with his talent in the parable of the talent?
options: dug the ground and buried his own
gave it back to his master

question: What happened to Jesus Christ immediately after the baptism, according to Matthew’s account?
options: Saw the heaven open and the spirit of God descending like a dove
Went up from the water and glorified God
Went up from the water and preached to the people
answer: Saw the heaven open and the spirit of God descending like a dove

question: Which of these is the greatest commandment taught by Jesus Christ?

options: theirs is the kingdom of heaven
they shall be called sons of God
answer: theirs is the kingdom of heaven

options: theirs is the kingdom of heaven

What was the meaning of Jesus Christ statement that He would destroy the temple and rebuild it in three days? It means that He
options: was angry and decided to make that comment
will bring foreign materials to build the house of God
will die and resurrect on the third day
will hire labourers to build the temple in three days
answer: will die and resurrect on the third day

question: How many disciples did Jesus send to collect the ass and colt with which He made the triumphant entry into Jerusalem?
“I adjure you by the living God, tell us if you are the Christ, the Son of God”. Who made the above statement?
What was Jesus reply to the statement above?
options: “You will not believe even if I say so”
“I am whom you say I am”
“You have said so you will see the son of man seated at the right hand of power and coming on the clouds of heaven”
answer: “You have said so you will see the son of man seated at the right hand of power and coming on the clouds of heaven”

question: Who was the third and the last person that identified Peter as one of Jesus disciples but he denied it and immediately the cock crowed?
“Are you the king of the Jews?” Who made the above statement?
Who did the people request to be released instead of Jesus Christ whom they maintained should be crucified?
Pilate sent Jesus Christ to Herod for trial because
options: Pilate had no power to condemn Jesus Christ to death
His wife warned him not to have anything to do with Jesus
Jesus was a Galilean and under the jurisdiction of Herod
Pilate found no reason to condemn Jesus Christ
answer: Jesus was a Galilean and under the jurisdiction of Herod

question: How did Pilate’s wife describe Jesus Christ?

What was the inscription written on the cross of Jesus Christ?
options: “This is the king of the Jews”
“This is Jesus, the king of the Jews”
answer: “This is Jesus, the king of the Jews”

question: What is the meaning of ‘Eli, Eli la’masabach-thani’?
options: Lord Jesus do not hold this sin against them
My Lord, my Lord, do not hold this sin against them
My God, my God, why has thou forsaken me
My God, my God, do not hold this sin against them
answer: My God, my God, why has thou forsaken me
